722946f-a.text:
(1)
Riverside Park: A northwestward view of the Claremont Inn from Riverside Drive (foreground) at West 124th Street. The gas holder seen
is between 132nd and 133rd Streets.
February 1914.
Walter L. Bogert.
(2)
The Port Lee Ferry at the foot of West 125th and 130th Streets, as viewed northward from a point slightly west of the Inn seen in No. 1. Note the wintery appearance of the Hudson River and the
Palisades on the Jersey coast.
February 1914.
Walter L. Bogert.

(1)

Walter L. Bogert.

707977f-b.text:
(1)
Second Ave., east side, between East 125th (left), and 124th Streets,
showing the bridge approach. Buildings, of which the rears are shown,
face on the north side of East 124th Street, east of Second Ave. Over- I
head is the Second Ave. Elevated line.
August 3, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, north from East 124th Street, showing work completed.
Structures shown on the extreme left, of which the rears are shown, face ]  on East 126th Street.
May 7, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
